projects.name: Enhancing capacities of public institutions to strengthen environmental and climate resilience
projects.description:
Programmatic interventions to support agencies strengthen environmental and climate resilience through; 
1.climate adaptation and restoration methods
2.Protection and conservation of Marine and Terrestrial ecosystems
3.Policy, regulatory and legal frameworks
4. Resource Mobilisation
projects.outcome: Institutions and communities are better prepared and collaborating to adapt to climate change and manage risks.

projects.name: Policy and Institutional Frameworks for the scaling up of circular economy opportunities in Seychelles is enhanced and gender-sensitive
projects.description: UNEP, through the joint SDG Fund, supported Seychelles in transitioning to a circular economy by conducting a situational analysis and developing a Circular Economy Roadmap and Action Plan. The analysis revealed that current initiatives were fragmented and lacked a unified framework, limiting broader economic benefits. projects.name: Financing Strategy for the development of the circular economy in Seychelles is developed and gender responsive
projects.description: A key barrier to advancing the circular economy in Seychelles is the lack of financing mechanisms and fiscal incentives to attract private sector investment. It is noted that MSMEs in Seychelles face challenges in accessing credit due to high interest rates, strict loan conditions, and lack of collateral. The project supported the development of a financing strategy to identify funding models and improve access to finance for both the government and private sector, helping MSMEs adopt circular b

projects.description: The project aims to assist the Government of Seychelles in developing and implementing a Kigali HFC Implementation Plan (KIP), focusing on phasing out HCFCs in line with Stage I of the plan and ensuring compliance with Montreal Protocol obligations.
